sense.gloss: calm and collected, with composure, having enough and to spare

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑余裕綽々↑↓よゆうしゃくしゃく↓と↑落↑↓お↓ち↑着↑↓つ↓いている。
sdata.e: He seems to have much in reserve.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓、↑大事↑↓だいじ↓なプレゼンがあるって↑言↑↓い↓うのに、↑余裕綽々↑↓よゆうしゃくしゃく↓だね。
sdata.e: You're pretty calm, cool and collected for somebody who has a major presentation tomorrow.

words.gloss: calm and collected, with composure, having enough and to spare
